alert.note: Alert for Clayton (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LaCrosse (Southwestern Wisconsin, Southeastern Minnesota, and Northeast Iowa)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 04 at 7:23PM CDT until May 11 at 1:00AM CDT by NWS LaCrosse
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Iowa... Wisconsin...Minnesota... Mississippi River at Guttenberg Dam 10 affecting Grant and Clayton Counties. Mississippi River at McGregor affecting Crawford, Grant, Allamakee and Clayton Counties. Mississippi River at La Crosse affecting Houston, Vernon and La Crosse Counties. Mississippi River at Wabasha affecting Wabasha and Buffalo Counties. ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Minnesota...Wisconsin... Mississippi River at Winona affecting Winona, Trempealeau and Buffalo Counties. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL EARLY THURSDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Mississippi River at Guttenberg Dam 10. * WHEN...Until early Thursday morning. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:00 PM CDT Thursday the stage was 17.9 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 7:00 PM CDT Thursday was 18.4 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage Wednesday morning and continue falling to 14.3 feet Thursday evening. - Flood stage is 15.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Additional river and weather information is available at www.weather.gov/lacrosse. The next statement will be issued Friday morning.
